scripts.dev: concurrently -n vite,electronBuild,electron -c cyan,magenta,green "vite --port 5173" "tsup electron/main.ts electron/preload.ts --format cjs --out-dir dist-electron --sourcemap --watch" "wait-on tcp:5173 && cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron dist-electron/main.cjs"
scripts.build: vite build && tsup electron/main.ts electron/preload.ts --format cjs --out-dir dist-electron --sourcemap
